insert your hook into the next stitch pull yarn through with new colour draw through both loops not es * pattern is worked in the round * american crochet terms used throughout pattern * magic_ring tutorial http //www planetjune com/blog/tutorials * pattern based on gnathalie s evil minions http //gnathalie2 wordpress com/2008/01/09/evil-minions with her permission make your minion b ody round 1 in adj ring single_crochet 6 round 2 2sc in next st 6 times 12sts round 3 single_crochet in next 2sc in next 6 times 18sts round 4 single_crochet in next 2 2sc in next 6 times 24sts round 5 in back loop single_crochet around rounds 6-12 single_crochet around round 13 in black single_crochet 8 in white single_crochet 8 in black single_crochet 8 - 24sts round 14 in black single_crochet 8 in white single_crochet 9 in black single_crochet 7 - 24sts round 15 in black single_crochet 9 in white single_crochet 8 in black single_crochet 7 - 24sts round 16 single_crochet in next 2 decrease 6 times 18 sts begin stuffing your ninja minion now round 17 single_crochet in next decrease 6 times 12 sts round 18 decrease 6 times 6 sts cut yarn leaving a tail about 3 long finish stuffing ninja minion so he is firm draw yarn through each stitch and pull tight to close sew into body and trim ear make 2 ch7 starting in second chain from hook 1sc in each of next 5 chain 3 single_crochet in next chain rotate work and 1sc in each st down the other side of the original chain break yarn and pull through this will give you 13 sts in a rectangular shape with one rounded end finishing attach ears to head in black embroider a long single stitch for each eye onto mask optional in white backstitch around mask sew in any remaining threads and trim ** beware your ninja minion is now ready for anything **
